Albion mdash; the county seat and largest village, home to Historic Courthouse Square and Mount Albion Childs mdash; a tiny hamlet with an excellent restaurant and the Cobblestone Museum Holley mdash; Kendall mdash; Lyndonville mdash; Medina mdash; a thriving canalside village with a fantastic railroad museum Waterport mdash; fishing and boating on Lake Alice
